text: Aap keh dijiye kay aey logo! Tum meray deen ki taraf say shak mein ho to mein inn maboodon ki ibadat nahi kerta jin ki tum Allah ko chor ker ibadat kertay ho lekin haan uss Allah ki ibadat kerta hun jo tumhari jaan qabz kerta hai. Aur mujh ko yeh hukum hua hai kay mein eman laney walon mein say hun
